required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics Study of Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Single-center, Randomized，Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single & Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics Study of Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet in Healthy Adult Subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase I, Single Center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single & Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Access the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet in Healthy Adult Subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: To assess the tolerability after a single and multiple dose of HEC84048
Maximum observed plasma concentration of HEC84048
Time of the maximum observed plasma concentration of HEC84048
Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC)

arm_group.description: It includes two groups, one group is a pilot study, 2 healthy subjects receive a single dose of 50 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet . Another group is a formal study, healthy subjects receive a single dose of 50 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo (N=2).

Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 100 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=20) or matching placebo (N=2) under fed or fasted conditions, this group is a two-sequence, two-period crossover study.
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 200 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 400 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 600 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 800 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving 100 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 5 days.
Healthy subjects, receiving 200 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 5 days.
Healthy subjects, receiving 400 mg Kangdaprevir Sodium Tablet (N=10) or matching placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 5 days.

facility.name: the First Hospital of Jilin University
